effect.scarlet_violet: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.the_teal_mask: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.

effect.legends_za: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
effect.mega_dimension: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.legends_za: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
short_effect.mega_dimension: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent the target from fleeing.
